News

Episodes

Join us for our most recent episode, where the Trio discusses "Truly Devious", the first in the recently completed series by Maureen Johnson.

"Truly Devious" follows protagonist Stevie Bell, a true crime prodidgy, as she navigates life as a young detective invited to solve a world famous cold case at one of the most interesting fictional boarding schools since Hogwarts.

Checkout our RSS Feed

Who We Are

This podcast is hosted by four best friends who use reading as an escape from reality. Join us as we dive into the pages of the most beloved, bemoand, and enchanting young adult fiction novels on the market today!

  1. Erin Meskill - Master of Puppers
  2. Kirstie Ellerbe - Professional Bookslinger
  3. Bailey Compton - Actual Librarian
  4. Cory Ellerbe - Code Monkey
